zombie.name: Catherine
zombie.backstory: Elementary school teacher for 22 years. Loved my job until perimenopause hit at 46 and I couldn't think straight anymore. Brain fog so bad I forgot students' names. Night sweats had me changing sheets at 3am. My doctor said 'it's just menopause, here's some antidepressants.' I wasn't depressed. I was HORMONAL. And nobody would listen. Spent $8,000 on tests and specialists who all said 'your labs are normal.' My labs were NOT normal for ME.
zombie.dramaticMoment: The breaking point was when I had a hot flash during parent-teacher conferences and completely blanked on a child's progress report. A parent asked if I was okay and I burst into tears in front of everyone. I went home that night and googled 'why won't anyone help me with menopause' and fell down a rabbit hole of hormone health education. Within 3 months of working with a hormone health coach, I felt like myself again. That's when I knew â€” I have to help other women avoid what I went through. ğŸ˜­
zombie.transformation: From brain-fogged teacher who couldn't remember student names and was told 'it's just aging' â†’ To certified Women's Hormone Health Specialist making $4,900/month helping women 40+ reclaim their bodies and their sanity.
zombie.incomeStory: $4,900/month working 18 hours/week. Started with free workshops at my church for perimenopausal women. Now I have 11 regular clients and a 6-week group program. Retired from teaching 5 months ago. Best decision of my life.

writingStyle.capitalization: mostly lowercase, ALL CAPS for emphasis on emotional words
writingStyle.punctuation: lots of exclamation marks!!, question marks after statements??
writingStyle.tone: fiery, passionate, no-BS, protective of women, uses 'girl' and 'sister'

zombie.videoTestimonialScript: Hi, I'm Catherine. I was a teacher for 22 years and perimenopause almost destroyed my career. Brain fog, night sweats, mood swings â€” and every doctor told me I was fine. I was NOT fine. [PAUSE] When I finally found hormone health coaching, it changed my life in weeks. Now I help other women avoid the years of suffering I went through. Last month I made almost five thousand dollars working part-time. If you're watching this and your doctor keeps telling you it's just aging â€” I see you. And there IS help.
